title: Front of Followers of the Line of the Imam and the Leader
text:
Front of Followers of the Line of <a href="Imam%20Khomeini">the Imam</a> and <a href="Imam%20Khamenei">the Leader</a> (), formerly known as Islamic Aligned Organizations () is a <a href="Coalition">Coalition</a> of <a href="Iran">Iran</a>ian <a href="Iranian%20Principlists">Principlist</a> <a href="political%20group">political group</a>s. The group which consists of a wide range of traditional conservative parties, is active since administration of <a href="Mohammad%20Khatami">Mohammad Khatami</a>, and is aligned with <a href="The%20two%20Societies">The two Societies</a>.
The coalition was the main conservative <a href="electoral%20list">electoral list</a> for the <a href="2000%20Iranian%20legislative%20election">2000 Iranian legislative election</a>, but became part of <a href="United%20Front%20of%20Conservatives">United Front of Conservatives</a>' list for the <a href="2008%20Iranian%20legislative%20election">2008</a> and <a href="2012%20Iranian%20legislative%20election">2012</a> legislative elections.
They endorsed 31 candidates for the <a href="City%20Council%20of%20Tehran">City Council of Tehran</a> in the <a href="2013%20Iranian%20local%20elections">2013 Iranian local elections</a>, only Abbas Sheybani was able to win a seat.
Parties.
The members of the coalition include:
